00055 class PLT_ThreadTask : public NPT_Runnable
00056 {
00057 public:
00058     friend class PLT_TaskManager;
00059 
00064     NPT_Result Kill();
00065     
00066 protected:
00072     virtual bool IsAborting(NPT_Timeout timeout) {
00073         return NPT_SUCCEEDED(m_Abort.WaitUntilEquals(1, timeout));
00074     }
00075     
00083     NPT_Result Start(PLT_TaskManager*  task_manager = NULL, 
00084                      NPT_TimeInterval* delay = NULL,
00085                      bool              auto_destroy = true);
00086     
00091     NPT_Result Stop(bool blocking = true);
00092     
00097     virtual void DoInit()    {}
00098     
00103     virtual void DoAbort()   {}
00104     
00108     virtual void DoRun()     {}
00109     
00113     PLT_ThreadTask();
00114     
00119     virtual ~PLT_ThreadTask();
00120     
00121 private:
00122     // NPT_Thread methods
00123     void Run();
00124 
00125 protected:
00126     // members
00127     PLT_TaskManager*    m_TaskManager;
00128 
00129 private:
00130     // members

00133     bool                m_AutoDestroy;
